presentation.title: Software Engineer
presentation.description: Passionate about technology and philosophy, I find inspiration in both to create innovative solutions.

about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: With 5 years of experience in software development, I understand that an exceptional product requires a holistic vision. That's why I immerse myself in all facets of the creative process, from design to architecture and development.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: My full-stack development capabilities allow me to contribute to all aspects of the software development lifecycle.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Front-end development is the bridge that connects ideas with end-users, bringing the product to life and ensuring a functional and interactive experience.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: Diseño y desarrollo de servidores y bases de datos eficientes con tecnologías como Node.js y MongoDB.

devops.title: DevOps
devops.description: Automatización de procesos de desarrollo y despliegue con tecnologías como Docker y GitHub Actions.

databases.title: Bases de datos
databases.description: Diseño y optimización de bases de datos relacionales y no relacionales con tecnologías como MySQL y MongoDB.

soft-skills.title: Soft skills
soft-skills.description: I believe in open communication, active listening, and proactive problem-solving to achieve successful outcomes.

certification.title: Certifications
certification.description: My technical skills are supported by these industry-recognized certifications.
